DOC.brief_summary: Oral carvedilol administered in escalating doses in patients with atrial fibrillation among patients with AF with fast ventricular rate.
DOC.brief_title: Oral Carvedilol in Escalating Doses in the Acute Treatment of Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.detailed_description: Patients with AF with FVR of any etiology were evaluated and given escalating doses of oral carvedilol in doses - 3.125mg OD, then 3.125 bid, then 6.25mg bid, then 12.5mg bid. The ECG was recorded regularly and analysed for rate reduction or control.
